column1: [Murphy] The Raptors are signing Isaac Bonga, per a source. Would assume it’s another small guarantee to compete for a spot in camp.
[Wojnarowski] The Wizards won’t extend a qualifying offer on F Isaac Bonga, making him an unrestricted free agent. Wizards need roster spots after taking on three players in the Westbrook trade.

[Wojnarowski] The Wizards won’t extend a qualifying offer on F Isaac Bonga, making him an unrestricted free agent, sources tell ESPN. Wizards need roster spots after taking on three players in Westbrook trade.
[Stein] The Raptors say they have signed free agent forward Isaac Bonga.
